article: thousands of u.s. marines pushed north toward baghdad in `` seek and destroy '' missions sunday , trying to open the route to the iraqi capital and stop days of attacks along a stretch that has become known as `` ambush alley .
abstract: marines push north along ambush alley u.s. forces surround najaf
